forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 17C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 62F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 34F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 68F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
